title: gsmApp 1.0.0
text: first major release gsmApp! ðŸ¥³

title: gsmApp 1.0.0
text: Adds faceted scatter plot view easy comparison site across assessments. New approach using sample data, using qs. allows app deployed shinyapps.io. columns now available view/inspection given domain. UI modified better user experience.

title: gsmApp 1.0.0
text: Fixed bug sample data erroneously used {gsm} v1.9.2 instead current dev branch, includes fixes htmlwidgets allowing interaction Shiny app.

title: gsmApp 0.6.0
text: release planned pre-v1.0.0 release includes significant changes UI, well changes allow app used experimentally live study data.

title: gsmApp 0.6.0
text: Adds site participant metadata improved drill-functionality. charts linked side-panel, site selected, metadata presented selected site across tabs. UI modified based user feedback provide better experience navigating app.

title: gsmApp 0.6.0
text: Namespacing documentation updated consistent R packages apps ecosystem.
